items.content_html: Welcome to the Telegram POS Bot repository! This bot is designed to revolutionize how small-scale traders manage their sales. Built entirely in JavaScript, this bot serves as a lightweight yet powerful alternative to traditional Point of Sale systems. With its versatility, scalability, and ease of use, it's the perfect personal assistant for you.

Built entirely in JavaScript, this bot serves as a lightweight yet powerful alternative to traditional Point of Sale systems. With its versatility, scalability, and ease of use, it's the perfect personal assistant for you.

items.content_html: Vastra UI is a modern, lightweight component library designed for developers who value speed and simplicity. Built with React.js, Framer Motion, and Tailwind CSS, Vastra UI empowers you to quickly create stunning user interfaces with ease.

items.content_html: Developed a web app for real-time recognition of Pakistani Sign Language (PSL) using deep learning. Achieved 99.8% accuracy for static gestures and 100% for dynamic gestures via lightweight neural networks and MediaPipe. The app enhances communication and education for Pakistan's 10M hearing-impaired citizens. Deployed with Flask.
items.title: ahk7300/PSLapp: Developed a web app for real-time recognition of Pakistani Sign Language (PSL) using deep learning. Achieved 99.8% accuracy for static gestures and 100% for dynamic gestures via lightweight neural networks and MediaPipe. The app enhances communication and education for Pakistan's 10M hearing-impaired citizens. Deployed with Flask.
